name: worm-project
description: Worm project with frontend, backend, and worm-api-angular-client

scripts.start-backend: cd backend && npm run mvnw spring-boot:run
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd worm-api-angular-client && npm install && npm run build && cd dist && npm pack && cd ../../frontend && npm rebuild worm-api-angular-client && npm install && cd ../bridge && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && cd backend && npm run mvnw clean package
scripts.lint:ci: cd backend && npm run mvnw spotless:check && cd .. && cd frontend && npm run lint && cd .. && cd bridge && eslint .
scripts.lint:fix: cd backend && npm run mvnw spotless:apply && cd .. && cd frontend && npm run lint -- --fix
